title: Screenshot element context menu
body:
This feature would add a "Screenshot element" context menu to an element in the DOM Explorer which will copy a screenshot cropped to the selected element to the clipboard.

Proposed Design
- New context menu item "&Screenshot element" to be enabled for any elements in the DOM tree of the DOM Explorer
- The command will fetch the bounding rectangle (top, left, width and height) for the element and then take a screenshot of the page and crop it to match the bounding rectangle for the element
- Non visible elements (e.g. display:none or non visible tags will copy nothing to screen) this test will be based on the ability target a bounding rectangle for the element
- visible:hidden elements will copy the space that is reserved by the element
